thread.section_title: LymphedemaProducts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LymphedemaProducts.com | lymphedemaproducts.com
thread.title: Ms Ellen L Lienhard
thread.title_full: LymphedemaProducts.com reviewed by Ms Ellen L Lienhard

author: Ms Ellen L Lienhard
title: Ms Ellen L Lienhard
text: On my first order I received a welcome email from cs; but when I replied to that email with my problem, no response. Simply stated, the product I received did not meet my needs; six inch stockinette but not nearly stretchy enough for my size legs. I did cut a length of the tubing to see how it would work; I asked if it would be returnable for perhaps shopper credit if you carry a product that would meet my needs. I await a response from someone.
